ygData.subject: RE: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrmm..well, he does have a point.  I was rather difficult to even understand your message without several reads.  Would it be so difficult to format it in a
ygData.messageBody:
Hrmm..well, he does have a point. I was rather difficult to even understand
your message without several reads. Would it be so difficult to format it
in a way that is clear to everyone? Considering that you are asking for
information, you'd think that you be a little more clear in your method of
speech.

I shall endeavor to answer it as best I can.

First paragraph: No clue what you are talking about, though I think it might
have something to do with a football game on Nintendo, Sega or whatever.

1.) Your weight info is off. The Lockjaw Vest, as I recall, weighs 1.5.
The Cured Silk weighs 0.1. The difference in coinage is about 55 coins of
any type. Since EQ uses a bracketing system, even 4 AC makes a difference
and +5 Stamina means more hit points, depending on your current stamina and
level.

2.) Don't know what I BOBS is, but I assume BOE means Bracer of Erollisi.
Yes, Lore means you can only own one. With the upgrade of the Bracer of
Erollisi, I feel it's worth it for the extra 0.9 weight. I supose BOBS
could refer to Bracer of Battle (S?). If so, then I don't think it's worth
the hassle of aquiring it.

3.) Reconsider Mistmoore. Orc Highway - what are you talking about? Maze -
Do you mean The Gorge of King Grobb? If so, it's a bit slow, but still
okay. You really shouldn't have to contend with lawn trash in Unrest at
that level. Also, consider Runnyeye, East Karana, South Karana, Rathe
Mountains, Cazic Thule, Permafrost and Upper Guk.

Assume "pimping" means what level should you consider adventuring there.
Cazic - 20, Sol A - 25, Sol B - 35.

Lei
